mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(payment_price), 0) FROM PAYMENT WHERE DATE_FORMAT(payment_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')) as totalSales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `ORDER` WHERE DATE(date) = CURRENT_DATE) as newOrderCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUERY WHERE status = '미답변') as inquiryCount
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(payment_price), 0) FROM PAYMENT WHERE DATE_FORMAT(payment_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `ORDER` WHERE DATE(date) = CURRENT_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE status = '가입'

SELECT o.order_id as orderId, p.product_name as productName, p.brand_name as brandName, op.quantity, o.total_price as price, o.status, pi.img_url as productImage FROM `ORDER` o JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT op ON o.order_id = op.order_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON op.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id ORDER BY o.date DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT o.order_id as orderId, o.date as orderDate, o.status, o.total_price as totalAmount, o.receiver as userName, o.receiver_phone as userPhone, o.address as userAddress, p.product_name as productName, p.brand_name as brandName, op.quantity, pi.img_url as productImage FROM `ORDER` o LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT op ON o.order_id = op.order_id LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON op.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id ORDER BY o.date DESC

SELECT o.order_id as orderId, p.product_name as productName, p.brand_name as brandName, op.quantity, u.name as userName, u.phone as userPhone, u.address as userAddress, o.status, o.date as orderDate, pi.img_url as productImage, o.total_price as price FROM `ORDER` o JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT op ON o.order_id = op.order_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON op.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON o.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE o.order_id = #{value}
SELECT p.*, COUNT(pc.product_click_id) as product_click FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_CLICK pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY product_click DESC LIMIT 5
